summary: Real Life preset for True Armor
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][b]EN: THIS IS A PRESET FOR THE MOD TRUE ARMOR BY ANUBIS22
[/b][/size][b][size=4]PT-BR: ISSO É UM ARQUIVO DE PREDIFINIÇÃO PARA O MOD TRUE ARMOR DO ANUBIS22[/size][/b]
[b][size=3]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89440]>> TRUE ARMOR MOD <<[/url]﻿

[youtube]m60_PlbWiUA[/youtube][/size][/b]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/US7Kb1f.png[/img][/center]
[b][i]VOLNUTT REAL LIFE PRESET[/i][/b]
I tried to make this preset more real life possible, [b][i]I did based on the design of armors, not lore.
[/i][/b]
[b]Cloth/Naked[/b] = 0% protection but have more movement and weapon speed
[b]Hide/Leather/Scaled[/b] = Low protection with small benefits for movement and weapon speed
[b]Iron/Steel[/b] = Medium protection with small negative effects for movement and weapon speed
[b]Dwarven[/b] = Power armor like, 90% protection, MAX NEGATIVE movement and weapon speed, most powerful amor for mid game.
I'm tired and don't want spoil the rest.. 



[color=red][b]Volnutt TRUE ARMOR Preset LITE[/b] Ver 1.0[/color]
The LITE preset only touches in
[b][General Settings][/b]
Armor priorities.
[b][Armors and Shield][/b]
Deflect, pierce, stagger protection, stamina regeneration, movement, weapon speed and all block settings.

[color=red][b]Volnutt TRUE ARMOR Preset FULL[/b] <<SOON>[/color][color=red]




[/color]
[b]RECOMMENDED MODS:[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89438/]Simply Balanced[/url] 
The same creator of True Armor.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89035/]Equipment Durability System[/url] 
No .esp, only dll better than loot and degradation.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85138/]Improvement Names Customized - SKSE[/url] 
I'm using the preset with +1, +2, +3.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85358/]Armor Rating Rescaled - SKSE[/url] 
Never tried, but seems good.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80341/]Crafting Requires Permission[/url] 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86109/]SV Mods Menu[/url]  MCM Menu for CRP
Complements Equipment Durability System, too much immersive 11/10.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51024/]Honed Metal[/url] 
Blacksmith can craft items for you.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79059/]Combat Surrender[/url] 
Kill the bandit chief and make the rest of the bandits flee.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64088/]SOT Hardcore Encumbrance[/url] 
This mod will add encumbrance penalties in a more immersive and challenging way.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81995/]No Rest For The Wicked[/url] 
No more boring death loading, I use this mod because death alternative and other death mods gave me ctd.


[b]COMBAT MODS:[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76529/]Wildcat[/url] 
Disable injury system, put the difficulty equivalent like 1x1, 5x5 for more realism, reccomend play on legendary with 5x5.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72180/]Vigor - Combat and Injuries[/url] 
Only maintain enabled injury system and potions for npc's.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36006/]Ultimate Combat[/url] 
Disable difficulty modifiers.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20923/]TK Dodge[/url] 
dodge animation
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9247/]Dual Wield Parrying[/url] 
This mod allows dual wielders to parry/block attacks.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10682102?tab=user+files/]5poiler FPS Animations[/url] 
Awesome animations.


[b]RECOMMENDED EQUIPMENT MODS:[/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/]Immersive Weapons[/url] 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44179/]Lore Weapon Expansion[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/]Faction Crossbows[/url] 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/]Immersive Armors[/url]
